subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Television
lead_paragraph: In response to lagging ratings and growing complaints, Fox says that games for this year’s A.L.C.S. and World Series would begin before 8 p.m. Eastern time, nearly 40 minutes earlier.
snippet: In response to lagging ratings and growing complaints, Fox says that games for this year’s A.L.C.S. and World Series would begin before 8 p.m. Eastern time, nearly 40 minutes earlier.
